白奈さん、後方８時！\n敵単体、来ます！:
Shirona-san, 8 o'clock in the back!
Enemy alone is coming!
あいつでラスト……そこだっ！！: That's the last one... right there!!
シリウスシュガーの面々は、連携技術も\n見違えるほど成長していた。:
The members of Sirius Sugaru don’t even know how to coordinate
She had grown to an unrecognizable degree.
ふい～！ 制圧完了！ もーメイズシフターいないよね？: Phew! We're done! There's no Mazeshifter, is there?
ええ！ 予定より早く制圧できましたわ。皆さん、お疲れ様です。: Yes! We were able to subdue them earlier than planned. Good work, everyone.
七彩の言葉に、全員から緊張が抜ける気配がした。: At Shichika’s words, the tension drained from all of them.
大型もいたが、危なげなく突破することができたな。: There was also a large one, but we managed to break through dangerously well.
持ち回りで役割をこなした結果でしょう。\n自身の役割以外の視点も持てたのが大きい:
It's probably the result of taking turns.
I'm sure you were able to see things from a different perspective than your role.
そうだな。各々が、他メンバーの動きにまで\n注意を払えるようになっている。いい傾:
That's right. Each of them even went so far as to move the other members.
I've become able to pay attention. It's a good trend.
とはいえ、この先もメイズは続く。気を引き締めていこう。: That said, Mayse will continue from here on out. Let's keep our guard up.
ま～でも、<r=プライマル・ベルト>原生帯</r>の敵なんて、\nもうラミ達の相:
Well~ But an enemy with a <r-primal belt> primogenitor belt </r>...
I'm not dealing with Rami and the others anymore, though!
どんな敵が来ても楽勝。わたし達ならなんとかできる。: No matter what enemy comes, it'll be a piece of cake. We can do something about it.
戦術とかじゃないよね。なんていうか……\nメイズの中で生き残るための、直感という:
It's not a tactic, is it? How should I put it...
I guess you could say it's a hunch to survive in the Mays?
メイズ適性が上がったこともあるのかもな。さて……: Maybe I've improved my mace aptitude. Now then...
この<r=ホール>広間</r>はしばらくは安全なはずだが……\nどうする？ 少し:
This <r-hole> hall should be safe for a while, but...
What should we do? Should we take a break?
消耗も損害も軽微。わたしは進んでもいいと思う。: The wear and tear and damage are minor. I think it's fine to move forward.
全然ヨユーだし！\n稼働時間もあるんだし、さっさといこーよ！:
It's totally fine!
We've got operational time, so let's get going!
わたくしも、おふたりに賛成ですわ。\nこの調子ならもう少し先に進んでも問題ないか:
I agree with the two of you.
At this rate, I don't think it'll be a problem if we go a little further.
わかった。ならもう少し先に進むか。: Okay. Then let's move on a little further.
わかりました！ では、めるさんを先頭に、\nフォーメーションを展開してくださいま:
Understood! Then, with Meru-san in the lead,
Please deploy your formation!
はいっ！ 目標はこの先、深層に向かう<r=ドリフト>横坑</r>ですねっ！: Yes! Our target is the <r-drift> Drift, which leads to the deep levels!
進路クリアー！\n敵の姿は見えません！:
Clear course!
I can't see the enemy!
へへ～ん、ラミ達に恐れをなして、\nみんな隠れちゃったんじゃないの～？:
Heheh, I'm afraid of Rami and the others,
Didn't everyone hide?
でも、それはそれでメイズシフターのためこむ\nタツミヤ鉱が得られない。:
But it's also for the sake of the maise shifter.
You can't get Tatsumiya Ore.
ちょうどいい感じに倒しやすいのが、出てくればいいんだけどね～。: It'd be nice if it came out just right to make it easier to defeat.
おいお前ら、作戦中に無駄話は──。: Hey, guys, don't waste time chatting during the operation.
そこまで言って、俺は気づく。\nメイズシフターの反応に。:
Having said that much, I realized.
In response to the Mayse-Sifter's reaction.
ラミの機体を押し倒すように、俺は前方に飛び込む。\n間一髪で、メイズシフターの攻:
I jump forward to push down the lammy machine.
By a hair’s breadth, I succeeded in avoiding the Mayz-Sifter’s attack.
後続のふたりの援護によって、\n奇襲をかけてきたメイズシフターは撃破された。:
With the support of the other two,
The Mayz-Sifter, which had launched a surprise attack, was destroyed.
白奈の機体を押し倒すように、俺は前方に飛び込む。\n間一髪で、メイズシフターの攻:
I jump forward to push down on Hakuna's machine.
By a hair’s breadth, I succeeded in avoiding the Mayz-Sifter’s attack.
……！！ 敵襲だよ！ ラミちゃん、援護を！: ...!! It's an enemy attack! Rami-chan, cover me!
ええ、大丈夫……ありがとう、助かった。: Yes, I'm fine... Thank you, you saved me.
ご、ごめんなさい！ 私、全然気付けなくて……！: I-I'm sorry! I didn't notice at all...!
いや、気が抜けてたのはラミ達のほう……: No, Rami and the others are the ones who have lost focus...
油断はしていなかったつもりだけど……\nごめんなさい。判断が遅れてしまった。:
I didn't let my guard down, but...
I'm sorry. My decision was delayed.
ああ、問題ない。機体を掠めただけみたいだ。: Yeah, there's no problem. Looks like it just grazed the aircraft.
ですが、さっきの行動は少し軽率だったように思います。\nその機体は自衛能力に乏し:
However, I think I was a little careless about what I did earlier.
That machine doesn’t have much self-defense ability, so if it gets hit, it’ll be a loss for the entire team.
ああ、わかっていたが、身体が勝手に動いてしまってな……: Yeah, I knew that, but my body just moved on its own...
まったく……\nあなたはそういうお人でしたね。:
Honestly...
That's the kind of person you are.
でもどうして気付けなかったんでしょう……\n探知機能に異常はないはずなのに……:
But why didn't I notice...?
There shouldn't be anything wrong with the detection function...
めるが見落としたわけじゃなくて、\nいなかった場所に『現れた』のかもしれない。:
It's not that I missed it.
Maybe she “appeared” where she wasn’t.
みんな。ちょっとこの周辺を調べてみよう。\n俺の推測が正しければ、何かが見つかる:
Guys, let's take a look around here.
If my guess is correct, I should be able to find something.
俺の指示で一同は周辺を調べ始める。: At my instruction, everyone began to investigate the area.
学園で共有されてるマップデータでは、１本道なんだけど……\nだとしたら、アイツは:
According to the map data shared by the school, it's a one-way street...
In that case, where did he come from?
俺もそれが引っかかってな。可能性があるとしたら……: That's what's bothering me, too. If there's a possibility...
……！！ みんな来て……！ これってもしかすると……: ...! Everyone, come here...! Could this be...
最近壁が崩れてできた穴みたいね。奥に空間があるみたい……！: It looks like a hole created by a wall collapsing recently. There's a space in the back...!
さっきのメイズシフターはここを通ってきたのだろう。: The maise shifter from earlier must have come through here.
マップにない<r=ドリフト>横坑</r>ってことですか！？: Does that mean the <r=drift> I don't see on the map is the Drift?!
未調査の新ルート、大発見じゃん！？\nタツミヤ鉱も手つかずで残ってんじゃない！？:
An unexplored new route is a huge discovery!
Isn't the Tatsumiya mine untouched, too?!
えー！ そんなんさ、行ってみるしかないよ！！\nせっかくここまで来たんだしさ！:
Whaaat?! We've got no choice but to go check it out!!
We've come this far, after all!
そうね。たとえ採掘できなくとも、\n簡単なマッピングはしてもいいかもしれない。:
That's right. Even if we can't mine,
It might be a good idea to do some simple mapping.
未発見ルートを報告するだけでも、報奨金はあるんだっけ。\nあたしはこのチャンス拾:
Just reporting an undiscovered route is a bounty, isn't it?
I think I should pick up this chance... What should I do?
各自の残存弾薬、稼働時間を鑑みるに、\n決して余裕があるとは言えません……:
Considering the remaining ammunition and operating time of each of them,
I can't say I have any time to spare...
<r=ホール>広間</r>の制圧に、推進剤も結構使っちゃいましたしね……: I used a lot of propellant to subdue the <r-hole> hall...
ですが……こんなチャンス、滅多には……: But... I don't get many chances like this...
俺は引き返すべきだと思う。: I think we should turn back.
えっ、なんで！？ 新ルートだよ！？ お宝ボーナスタイムだよ！？: Huh? Why?! This is a new route! It's treasure bonus time!
これはリスクのほうが大きいと判断した。\nこの先は知っている道ならともかく、知ら:
I decided that the risk was greater.
The path ahead would be one thing if I knew, but it was a route I didn’t know.
正直みんなを必要以上に危ない目に遭わせたくない。: Honestly, I don't want to put everyone in any more danger than necessary.
──作戦を変更、未調査<r=ドリフト>横坑</r>を探索します。: -Change of plan. Search unexplored <r = Drift> Drifting Shaft <r>.
うん、いい判断ね。: Yeah, that was a good decision.
すみません、%usernameusernameuserna%さん。\nここは行か:
I'm sorry, %usernameusernameuserna%-san.
Will you let me come here?
さっき%usernameusernameuserna%さんは言いました。\nわた:
%usernameusernameuserna%san said earlier.
She said she didn't want to put us in danger.
わたくし達って、まだそんなに頼りないですか？ 弱いですか？\nあなたをそんなにも:
Are we still that unreliable? Weak?
Are these women so pathetic that they make you worry so much?
自分で言うのもなんですが、あなたのおかげで私達は\nカラフルブーケに勝利し、カオ:
I don't know if it's my place to say this, but thanks to you, we
He won the colorful bouquet and Chaos Maiden...
そしてこの<r=プライマル・ベルト>原生帯</r>のメイズシフターにも、\n冷静:
And to this <r-primal belt> primogenitor belt <r> maise shifter, too
I've become able to deal with it calmly.
リーダーは七彩だ。お前が自分の意志で決めたなら、反対はしない。\nむしろ今の言葉:
The leader is Shichika. If you've made up your mind, I won't object.
If anything, I was really happy to hear that.
ただ、引き際だけは考えておいたほうがいい。: However, it's best to think about when to withdraw.
はい、もちろんです。\nメイズシフターと遭遇したら即時撤退ですわ。:
Yes, of course.
If we run into the Mazesifter, we'll withdraw immediately.
そうして俺達は、未調査<r=ドリフト>横坑</r>の中へと足を踏み入れた──: And so, we entered the unexplored <r-drift> Drift.
